en_US: {STRVAR_1 3, 1, 0}’s mom: Oh, hi,
Are you looking for {STRVAR_1 3, 1, 0}?
He was gone for a second, but then
he came running right back home.
He just can’t sit still, that boy.
I wonder who he takes after?
